timeline.message:

Added support for clang-analyzer plists (tested with plist-multi-file output
format).

timeline.bodyText:
I think you have a typo in the filename:

the file is: ClangAnalzer.txt
the fileName is: ClangAnalyzer.txt
timeline.author: uhafner

replies.bodyText: Thanks. I've also found the problem in log. Wonder why it wasn't triggered on my machine.
replies.author: andreydanin

replies.bodyText: And also there are 3 issues in the test file...
replies.author: andreydanin

timeline.bodyText: Can you please overwrite getUrl and return https://clang-analyzer.llvm.org (or the correct one if this is another tool)?
timeline.author: uhafner

replies.bodyText: Additionally: if the result format is not the default, please add a small help text on how to produce, like here: https://github.com/jenkinsci/warnings-ng-plugin/blob/master/src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/warnings/Detekt.java#L57
replies.author: uhafner
